description:
One of the heroes who brought victory to humanity during the "Twilight of the Demon Gods", a huge war between demons and humans. Called the "Sword Saint" because of her ability to wield two longswords. When Aria`s village, Lumines, was attacked by the demon armies, she saved it all alone. The woman who saved Aria`s life, and the woman that Aria admires.
Source: Official page
name: Alisha
